channel.title: [PI] OX client.class hacking!
channel.description:
So i have a [b]Server[/b] that is based [u]on[/u] [font=comic sans ms]OverloadX[/font] which is based on [u][b][PI][/b][/u] And i found out that you can replace the [i][b]client.class[/b][/i] to another [i][b]client.class[/b][/i] that has been changed [font=andale mono](so the client.class1 is the original and they replace it with client.class2 which is modified!)[/font] And then you have a fully working [font=times new roman]commands[/font] that you could possibly spawn party-hats and many other things, if anyone has the brain to find out how to [u][b]fix[/b][/u] this please tell Reply
please check my playerassistant.java here i can't even find a word that starts with method
http://pastebin.com/a420gTUA [font=georgia][i]p.s. some people have been telling me i have to change something in [i]playerassistant.java[/i].[/i][/font]

Con i haz fagex surce cde plz i pay 5 dollar PLZ respond

Otherwise this guy is correcto <-- I can speak spanish all you gotta do is add a O or a a GF Language[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] OX client.class hacking!
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

thats the client side exploit… it’s sending a packet that would spawn a certain item. like this

this.stream.writeDWord(4152); //itemid this.stream.writeDWord(10000); //amount

would spawn 10000 noted whips

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] OX client.class hacking!
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

public void handleStatus(int i, int i2, int i3) { if (i == 1) c.getItems().addItem(i2,i3); else if (i == 2) { c.playerXP[i2] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(i3)+5; c.playerLevel[i2] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[i2]); } }

comment that out, then remove the line that calls that method, or you will get an error.

Read full topic
